entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-01
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Cannot create a DbSet for 'MostExpensiveProduct' because this type is not included in the model for the context. #31424
  • Unable to add data into SQL table - exception thrown, but query works OK #31926
  • Ignore specified query filters #31869
  • Stylecop rulesets are being applied on generated EF bundle and build is failing in gitlab pipleine #31804
  • Much needed #31754
  • ValueObject == null, Property could not be translated #31593
  • Complex type using Ownsone as Primary key #31426
  • 8.0 API Reviews #30306
    8.0.0
  • Ef Core RC1 Sql Server Compiled Model Stackoverflow #31751
    8.0.0

Updated

  • Enforcing usage of FluentAPI instead of attributes #31889
  • TPC does not work "out of the box" with Sqlite #31752
  • Is it possible to define relationships that could reference one of multiple tables without foreign keys? #31913
  • Referencing a third table in `JOIN` clauses #31894
  • Hierarchyid in a parameter collection does not work in 8.0-rc1 with MSSQL #31912
  • Search a table using a list of strings in EF Core 8 preview (where in clause) #31898
  • SQLite affinity fallback is wrong: fallback to blob instead of numeric #31915
  • Is there a way to alter the DbContext configuration after AddDbContext has been called? #31905
  • VB.Net Expression translation causes errors #31878
  • HasConversion<string> from GUID generated migrations contains non existent column called TempId #31860
    Backlog
  • Result of left joining a nullable nominal type should be null (i.e. no instance) and not an instance with all null property values #22517
    Backlog
  • Data inconsistency while loading entities based on new changed prop before SaveChangesInterceptor.SavingChangesAsync #31741
  • Batched queries for explicit loading #31567
    Backlog
  • Store ValueGenerator directly in IProperty runtime annotation instead of ValueGeneratorCache #31901
  • When i compile models, in xxxxxCompliedModelBuilder.cs show "CS0204 Only 65534 locals are allowed" #31370
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Calculate sentinel value inside RuntimeProperty #31923
  • [TEST ONLY] Check if tests have any results rather than looking at entry count #31922

Merged

  • [release/8.0] Mitigation for stack overflow with compiled model on Mac #31896
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Validate single discriminator values #31916
    Servicing-consider
